name: Slow Cooker Ham and Potato Soup
author: Kristy Walker
summary: This slow cooker ham and potato soup turned out amazing and got a definite do-over rating by friends and family.
ingredients: 4 cups water, or more as needed
2 tablespoons chicken base (such as Better Than Bouillon® Roasted Chicken Base)
1 ½ pounds Yukon Gold potatoes, cubed
1 cup cubed ham, or more to taste
¼ cup shredded Cheddar cheese, or to taste
directions: Combine ham hock, onions, carrot, water, chicken base, sage, thyme, and rosemary in a large slow cooker
Cover and cook on Low, 8 hours to overnight
Stir potatoes and tomatoes into the soup and cook on Low, 3 to 4 hours more
Remove ham hock, shredding with 2 forks, leaving behind any meat
Meanwhile, melt butter in a saute pan over medium heat
Whisk in flour until it is thick, aromatic, and slightly browned, 15 to 20 minutes
Add half-and-half until it is gravy consistency
Add mixture to the slow cooker and mix well
